LanguageData.Sandbags.label: sandbags
LanguageData.TurretGun.label: improvised turret
LanguageData.TurretGun.description: An improvised turret that automatically fires at nearby enemies. Explodes when damaged. Its hacked-together AI brain isn't very smart, and can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_TurretImprovised.label: improvised turret bullet
LanguageData.Gun_TurretImprovised.label: improvised turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_TurretImprovised.description: Jury-rigged gun attached to a turret.
LanguageData.Turret_MortarBomb.label: mortar
LanguageData.Turret_MortarBomb.description: A mortar that launches explosive shells. Must be manned. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Artillery_MortarBomb.label: explosive mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_MortarBomb.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.Bullet_MortarBomb.label: explosive mortar shell
LanguageData.Turret_MortarIncendiary.label: incendiary mortar
LanguageData.Turret_MortarIncendiary.description: A mortar that launches incendiary shells. Must be manned. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Artillery_MortarIncendiary.label: incendiary mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_MortarIncendiary.description: Incendiary mortar launcher. Lobs fire-starting bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.Bullet_MortarIncendiary.label: incendiary mortar shell
LanguageData.Turret_MortarEMP.label: EMP mortar
LanguageData.Turret_MortarEMP.description: A mortar that launches EMP bombs. Must be manned. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Artillery_MortarEMP.label: EMP mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_MortarEMP.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs EMP bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.Bullet_MortarEMP.label: EMP mortar bomb
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall.label: deadfall trap
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall.description: A suspended spiked weight held up by a delicate trigger. When the victim disturbs the trigger, the weight is released and falls on his head or torso.
LanguageData.TrapIEDBomb.label: IED trap
LanguageData.TrapIEDBomb.description: A mortar shell connected to a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the trigger, the shell explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
LanguageData.TrapIEDIncendiary.label: IED incendiary trap
LanguageData.TrapIEDIncendiary.description: Explosives mixed into an incendiary paste with a chemical trigger for dispersal. Its chemical trigger is simple and reliable.
